Han Solo is SoloQ
Kylo Ren is DynamicQ
Correction: Dynamic Q is the lightsaber. Riot is Kylo Ren.

The joke:
The lightsaber is a failure, but it still kills Han.

it is actually one of the most practical lightsabers out there thanks to the cross guard.

the reason is that in star wars a lot of hands get cut off during lightsaber battles so if you have a way to protect them you can fight easily for longer.

If you actually ever dwelled into the issue, you'd understand most of those cuts were clean. Cross guard doesn't help shit, if your hand is hit at 90 degree angle.

Secondly, due to the nature of lightsabers it was impossible for the blade to "slide" down for a hilt to make sense. Why? Because magnetic fields stop lightsaber on the spot and lightsabers themselves use magnetic fields to maintain the blade, so when two collide, you can only pull them away, not slide them aganist each other like normal swords.

Thirdly, early versions of lightsabers were ceremonial blades, that require a huge battery 
strapped behind Jedi's back to work merely as a flash light for a moment, due to energy loses and overheating.
Later iterations were closed circuits with build-in energy cells that only lost energy when actively cutting something, hence why those "_modern_" models lasted for years.

Kylo's basically has two blades. One "_proper_" and second "_prototype_", that's entirely lost energy.

The fact his lightsaber didn't run out of power while merely fighting Rei, makes it one of the biggest jokes in Star Wars.

create solo queue as we were promised*

old queue was solo/duo, still not the solo queue that we want.

solo Q is never coming back dude
riot doesn't give a shit about us
i don't even play league anymore, i only browse the boards once a month to see if anyone still cares
league is dead
Still one of the most populated games, not dead.

It would be nice to have solo queue and dynamic queue so you can pick . You are with friends or teammates dynamic you ARE SOLO , SOLO QUEUE ! Dont think they even consider it ...they would bring some sort of shit like time will be to long bla bla bla ! -_-

I almost feel that you would need someone like Han Solo to infiltrate Riot for them to actually do anything about the meaningless ranking system they have now.
